meanings.definition: Made up of various parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The composited puzzle had pieces of different colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed a composited painting with a mix of styles and techniques.
meanings.sent3: The composited cake looked like a rainbow of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a composited blend of vintage and modern fashion.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a composited masterpiece of flowers and greenery.

meanings.sent1: The composited flavors of the dish created a unique taste.
meanings.sent2: The team worked on a composited project that merged different ideas.
meanings.sent3: The composited colors in the painting seemed to dance together.
meanings.sent4: The music was a composited mix of genres that surprised the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sky at sunset had a composited palette of oranges and pinks.

meanings.definition: Created by combining different elements or materials
meanings.sent1: The composited material was stronger than any single component.
meanings.sent2: The dress was a composited design of lace and silk.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a composited creation of flavors and decorations.
meanings.sent4: The story was a composited tale of adventure and mystery.
meanings.sent5: The building was a composited structure of steel and glass.
